Summary: What sounded like a Military/ UFO engagement
divs: sighting detailswhat i witnesed was an unusual high level of military aircraft in the area. the sounds of these aircraft were not the the usual\standard practice landings that we see\hear so frequently in the battle creek area. what i heard was a low level, engagement activity in my area. this was no practice activity, the military aircraft were after something, and moving very fast. what i would describe as the enitial engagement lasted about two minutes... then i went outside, and heard the "enagement" for another 4-5 minutes or so. i can only say that i've grown up with the battle creek air show, and the air force's thunderbirds. what i heard tonight was now excercize... there were clearle fighters chasing something very fast, and the engagement lasted about five minutes from my perspective. hopefully this report can give creedence to similar reports in the area tonight.
